text: Varu, miku ekkada eduraite akkadane varini campandi. Mariyu varu mim'malni eccati nundi tarimi vesaro, miru kuda varini accati nundi tarimi veyandi. Mariyu satyadharmaniki adduga nilavatam (phitna), campatam kante ghoramainadi. Masjid al haram vadda varu mito yud'dham ceyananta varaku miru varito akkada yud'dham ceyakandi. Okavela vare mito (a pavitra sthalanlo) yud'dham ceste varini vadhincandi. Ide satyatiraskarulaku tagina siksa
